ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
RocketPy is a trajectory simulation for High-Power Rocketry built by
Projeto Jupiter. The code is written as a Python library and allows
for a complete 6 degrees of freedom simulation of a rocket's flight
trajectory, including high fidelity variable mass effects as well as
descent under parachutes. Weather conditions, such as wind profile,
can be imported from sophisticated datasets, allowing for realistic
scenarios. Furthermore, the implementation facilitates complex simulations,
such as multi-stage rockets, design and trajectory optimization and
dispersion analysis.
about.summary: Advanced 6-DOF trajectory simulation for High-Power Rocketry.

about.description:
RocketPy is a trajectory simulation for High-Power Rocketry built by
Projeto Jupiter. The code is written as a Python library and allows
for a complete 6 degrees of freedom simulation of a rocket's flight
trajectory, including high fidelity variable mass effects as well as
descent under parachutes. Weather conditions, such as wind profile,
can be imported from sophisticated datasets, allowing for realistic
scenarios. Furthermore, the implementation facilitates complex simulations,
such as multi-stage rockets, design and trajectory optimization and
dispersion analysis.
about.summary: Advanced 6-DOF trajectory simulation for High-Power Rocketry.

name: rocketpy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "rocketpy" %}
{% set version = "1.11.0" %}

package:
  name: rocketpy
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 00810475408ff5923b54398d243c4ae9264a479afbebe165e902a478813cc46c

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=42
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy >=1.13
    - scipy >=1.0
    - matplotlib-base
    - netCDF4 >=1.6.4
    - requests
    - pytz
    - simplekml
    - dill
    - timezonefinder
    - windrose >=1.6.8
    - IPython
    - ipywidgets >=7.6.3
    - jsonpickle
    - imageio
    - statsmodels
    - prettytable

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - rocketpy

about:
  home: https://github.com/RocketPy-Team/RocketPy
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Advanced 6-DOF trajectory simulation for High-Power Rocketry.
  description: |
    RocketPy is a trajectory simulation for High-Power Rocketry built by
    Projeto Jupiter. The code is written as a Python library and allows
    for a complete 6 degrees of freedom simulation of a rocket's flight
    trajectory, including high fidelity variable mass effects as well as
    descent under parachutes. Weather conditions, such as wind profile,
    can be imported from sophisticated datasets, allowing for realistic
    scenarios. Furthermore, the implementation facilitates complex simulations,
    such as multi-stage rockets, design and trajectory optimization and
    dispersion analysis.
  doc_url: https://docs.rocketpy.org/en/latest/index.html
  dev_url: https://github.com/RocketPy-Team/RocketPy

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - MateusStano
    - phmbressan
    - Gui-FernandesBR
    - Lucas-Prates
    - juliomachad0
    - LUCKIN13
